Liz is a programmer and designer for the web and games. Her main career interest is web design and front-end development.

Liz is currently attending Rutgers University in New Brunswick, NJ full-time where she is studying Information Technology and Informatics with a minor in Digital Communication, Information, and Media.

Some of the technologies she has used in projects are Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, APIs, and Wordpress, although she also loves making graphics and illustrations in FireAlpaca. Currently she is interested in Wordpress and Tumblr theme development and is working on making a blog and maintaining a social media presence.

When not coding, she is either watching dramas or anime, writing, or posting her artwork online. As a completionist, she loves checking off every little thing that has to be done. Yes, lizards and birds are some of her favorite animals, not surprisingly.

She is currently looking for an internship in the Central Jersey area in web development, design, video games, or another IT position.
